alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Weld County through 415 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ault, or 11 miles north of Greeley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greeley, Eaton, Severance, Ault, Pierce, Nunn, Grover, Purcell, Galeton, Briggsdale, Lucerne and Barnesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County
